description.p: You worked as a lifeguard before the apocalypse happened, and you were good at it too.

ul.li: Skill Proficiencies: You can select any two skills to be proficient with. You also gain a swimming speed of 30 feet.
Tool Proficiencies (Optional): You can be proficent with land or water vehicles, along with healer's kits.
Equipment: A swimsuit and red lifeguard shirt, a healer's kit, backpack, explorer's kit.

select.name: Personality Trait
select.item: I am overly cautious and protective of life.

select.name: Ideal
select.item: I will do everything I can to protect life.
I'm quick to resolve conflict, regardless of future consequences.
By the book is the best way to fix issues.

select.name: Bond
select.item: I am fiercely protective of those around me.
Every life is valuable and worth saving.
I know best in chaotic situations.

select.name: Flaw
select.item: I think that I always know best.
I'm quick to default to higher authority.
I'm quick to find a common solution, regardless of future implications.

description.p: As a Lifeguard, you gain the ear and friendly interest of people with medical backgrounds and you can leverage this interest into access to people and places you might not otherwise have.
